aboutpara: As a Software Engineer at Lowe's India, I develop web and mobile applications for the home improvement industry using Java, Microservices, React, JavaScript, and Node. With over 2 years of experience, I am passionate about learning new technologies and honing my skills. I graduated from Nirma University in 2021 with a Bachelor of Technology in Electronics and Communication Engineering and completed a full-stack developer course at Newton School. This equipped me with the expertise to build end-to-end web applications using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node. I enjoy working on personal projects and participating in hackathons. Some of my recent projects include a mobile app for organizing and joining local sports tournaments, a web app for watching and reacting to the latest movies, and a personal website showcasing my resume, portfolio, and blog. I am always open to new opportunities and challenges that help me grow professionally and personally. Feel free to connect if you want to collaborate or chat about software development.

resume.description: With over 2 years of experience in developing and optimizing microservices and full-stack applications. Proficient in Java, Spring Boot, and RESTful API development, with a strong background in data handling and UI development. Adept at working in fast-paced environments, quickly learning new technologies, and delivering secure solutions.

Developed a backend system that improved order recovery efficiency by 30%, Developed the front end from scratch using React (with Redux Toolkit) for the front end Java 17 (with WebFlux) for the back end
